oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Web Concordance of the Prakirna-Prakasa of Helaraja on the Jatisamuddesa (3.1) of Vakyapadiya
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: KULKARNI, M
DANGARIKAR, C
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: web concordance
kwic index
sanskrit grammar
prakirna-prakasa
jatisamuddesa
vakyapadiya
bhartrhari (450 ad)
helaraja (980 ad)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This article presents features of the web concordance in the forth of KWIC (key word in context) index of the Prakirna-Prakasa of Helaraja (980 A.D.) on the Jatisamuddesa of Vakyapadiya (450 A.D.), a seminal work in Indian grammatical tradition. Apart froth the original text it also takes into account variant readings in the text. This searchable concordance will be useful for the philological study of the text.
